messageBody:
Testing Action classes of framework

Hi

We have written Action classes using the struts framework. We need to write Unit Test cases for the Action classes. I have explored cactus, the framework for testing servlets and JSPs, but could not understand how to test the action classes using struts.

Actually, the cactus framework requires that we instantiate the servlet class which is to be tested. In the case of ActionServlet, if we try to instantiate the class, an InstantiationException is thrown......

Any idea how we will be able to resolve this.

thanks

Pranshu
